creator_2: Dravidian Association, Singapore (translated from Tamil script)
physical_appearance: "The image displays a wedding certificate. The Tamil scripts are either printed in blue ink or handwritten in this certificate. At the top of the certificate, a logo of a flag along with the Tamil script denoting the Dravidian Association Singapore is displayed. The dates ""1951"" and September ""16"" are handwritten near the bottom of the certificate. There is a border which separates the Tamil scripts from the outer perimeter of the certificate."
sgcool_label_text: Mr. S Gopalakrishnan (b. in 1920 in Tanjavur) was a prominent violinist, and Carnatic singer. He arrived in Singapore in 1939 and actively participated in the Indian classical music scene here. Mr Gopalakrishnan performed alongside veterans of classical performers such as Pandit M Ramalingam and MV Gurusamy at temple and other music festivals. He also taught violin lessons at the Singapore Malayalee Association from the 1970s to 2000s. He was a member of the Tamils Reform Association and performed his wedding according to the principles of the Self-Respect Movement. He was also employed as a compositor at the Far East Air Force from 1954 to 1970.
title_text: Wedding certificate of S Gopalakrishnan and Marimuthu Ammal
subject_terms_2: Marriage Certification Legal documents Special events
